sentences.en: A few months ago I rang up about some housing problems.
sentences.cn: 几个月前，我打电话问过一些住房的问题。

sentences.en: a scheme to provide affordable housing for local people
sentences.cn: 为当地民众提供平价住宅的计划

sentences.en: Blacks have been hurt by racial inequalities in housing and education.
sentences.cn: 住房与教育方面的种族不平等现象让黑人深受伤害。

sentences.en: health problems caused by bad housing
sentences.cn: 住房条件差引起的健康问题

sentences.en: I think that the underlying problem is education, unemployment and bad housing.
sentences.cn: 我认为深层的问题在于教育、失业和糟糕的住房条件。

sentences.en: If you are a council tenant call the housing department about it.
sentences.cn: 市建住房租户请就该问题致电住房部。

sentences.en: Little of the existing housing is of good enough quality.
sentences.cn: 现有的住房几乎少有质量过关的。

sentences.en: Local public housing authorities disagree with this reading of the law.
sentences.cn: 当地的公共住房管理当局不同意对该法律的这种解读。

sentences.en: More money should be spent on education and housing.
sentences.cn: 应当在教育和住房方面投入更多的资金。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Poor housing and family stress can affect both physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 住房条件差、家庭压力大会影响身心两方面的健康。

sentences.en: public services such as education, housing and transport
sentences.cn: 诸如教育、住房和交通等的公共服务

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentences.en: Resources will be further strained by new demands for housing.
sentences.cn: 资源将因新的住房需求而变得更紧张。

sentences.en: The best housing they could afford was crowded and filthy.
sentences.cn: 他们能住得起的最好的住所也非常拥挤、肮脏不堪。

sentences.en: The commission pinpoints inadequate housing as a basic problem threatening village life.
sentences.cn: 该委员会明确指出住房不足是威胁村民生活的根本问题。

sentences.en: The recent rebound in mortgage rates could snuff out the housing recovery.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率最近的回升可能会扼杀房地产的复苏。

sentences.en: They decided a housing co-operative was the way to regenerate Ormiston Crescent.
sentences.cn: 他们最终决定通过住房合作社来重建奥米斯顿月牙街。

words.tran_cn: [建]房屋；住房供给；[机]外壳；遮盖物；机器等的防护外壳或外罩

phrases.tran_cn: 经济适用房；可支付住宅
住宅区；居民村；房地产业
住宅信贷，住宅金融；住房集资
住宅；现有公屋单位数目
公共住房，政府为低收入者所建的住房

trans.tran_en: the houses or conditions that people live in
